title: JS BeerScript!
details:
Details
-------

![https://secure.meetupstatic.com/photos/event/e/5/7/600\_453183671.jpeg](./images/600_453183671.jpeg)

We're BACK!

Alcohol + Code = LOVE!

BeerScript is our lightest event where like minds get together, have a pint, and talk javascript/coding. Feel free to bring your laptop, but there is no specific programming/talk portion to the event.

We'll be at the Rivoli for the second last Tuesday in July! Come talk Javascript, Development, and Alcohol!
